Module org.neo4j.driver

Package org.neo4j.driver.reactive

package org.neo4j.driver.reactive
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.neo4j.driver
     
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    ReactiveQueryRunner
    Common interface for components that can execute Neo4j queries using Reactive API.
    ReactiveResult
    A reactive result provides a reactive way to execute query on the server and receives records back.
    ReactiveSession
    A reactive session is the same as Session except it provides a reactive API.
    ReactiveTransaction
    Same as Transaction except this reactive transaction exposes a reactive API.
    ReactiveTransactionCallback<T>
    Callback that executes operations against a given ReactiveTransactionContext.
    ReactiveTransactionContext
    A context for running queries within transaction.
    RxQueryRunner
    Deprecated.
    superseded by ReactiveQueryRunner and ReactiveQueryRunner
    RxResult
    Deprecated.
    superseded by ReactiveResult and ReactiveResult
    RxSession
    Deprecated.
    superseded by ReactiveSession and ReactiveSession
    RxTransaction
    Deprecated.
    superseded by ReactiveTransaction and ReactiveTransaction
    RxTransactionWork<T>
    Deprecated.
    superseded by ReactiveTransactionCallback and ReactiveTransactionCallback
